name: Multifactor
tagline: A password manager built for secure sharing with humans & AI
description: Multifactor lets you share access to accounts securely without exposing passwords. Use links like Google Docs to grant access. Import from LastPass, Apple, or Google with one click. Let AI agents log in and take action with your permission.

name: Build0
tagline: Build custom internal apps in minutes, no coding required
description: Tired of waiting on engineering bandwidth or duct-taping tools that donâ€™t fit? Build secure internal apps and AI workflows that actually match how your team works yourself - no code needed. One prompt gets you a fully working enterprise-grade app that you can use and share immediately: frontend, backend, database, and security/privacy built-in (auth, permissions, audit logs). Connect to your own database or any third-party tools like HubSpot, Airtable, Sheets, Stripe, and more.

name: 1stCollab
tagline: Fully-automated, ROI-optimized influencer marketing platform
description: 1stCollab is the fastest way to test, optimize, and scale your influencer program. Instantly source thousands of creators, and let our platform handle everything â€” outreach, negotiations, contracting, payments, and taxes â€” all while maximizing ROI.

name: Parrot
tagline: Tiktok for learning spanish
description: Learn Spanish 2.7x faster with Parrot the TikTok-style language app using research-backed, video-based learning. Trusted by thousands. Try it free.

name: Odyssey-2
tagline: Instant, interactive video model that brings video to life
description: Odyssey-2 is a breakthrough interactive video model. It streams AI video instantly (at 20 FPS) that you can interact with in real-time. Using text prompts, you can guide the video as it plays, turning it from a fixed clip into a live, emergent experience.

name: AI Professors by Aden
tagline: AI Replaces Professors
description: For decades, learning has looked the same: PDFs, slides, and passive videos. ðŸ˜´ Itâ€™s time for something new. ðŸš€ Meet Adenâ€™s AI Training Rooms, where your instructor isnâ€™t human anymore ðŸ¤–. Each AI Avatar acts like a digital professor, guiding you through lessons, quizzes, and real-world simulations that actually stick. From Safety Compliance to Jedi training ðŸ§ âœ¨ upload a doc, set milestones, and let AI do the teaching. Try it now and meet your AI professor today!

name: Pianolyze
tagline: Learn any piano song using AI/ML, right in your browser!
description: Pianolyze transcribes piano recordings using AI that runs entirely in your browser. Drag and drop any MP3, WAV, FLAC, or M4A file and watch as the notes appear in real-time on a piano roll. Slow down playback to study difficult passages, zoom in to see exactly what's being played, and explore the harmonic choices of your favorite pianists. Perfect for jazz students, classical pianists, and anyone curious about music.

name: Asimov
tagline: A unified interface for AI vector search
description: Asimov is a unified platform for Vector Search for AI Agents. You can just upload your sources, documents or pretty much anything â€” and use Asimov to search from those sources with a single API Request. No need to manually embed, chunk, re-rank and manage a vector database ever again.

name: Refinder AI
tagline: Turn your Slack & Google Chat into AI-Powered Assistant
description: Refinder turns chat into action. Ask in Google Chat (Slack coming soon) and it checks calendars, books meetings, updates Jira tasks, and organizes data in Sheets in seconds through simple conversation. After a quick login-level setup, Refinder runs smoothly without complex settings. Just talk and it executes your workflow, from scheduling and reporting to summarizing data, while keeping everything in sync. Itâ€™s the fastest way to turn everyday chat into real work.

name: Perssua
tagline: Real-time guidance from any LLM (including local ones)
description: I made Cluely, but like, local LLM support! We're talkin' offline vibes, zero latency, and privacy so tight it makes a VPN look like a screen door on a submarine. Of course you can also connect OpenAI, Gemini, OpenRouter or any other custom API that supports OpenAI standards Btw: ZERO VC money

name: Quidget 2: AI Agent for CX
tagline: Automate 80% of support emails in under 2 minutes
description: Quidget 2 redefines how teams handle email support. It instantly reads, classifies, and responds to up to 80% of repetitive messagesâ€”trained entirely on your companyâ€™s own docs, macros, and brand tone. Every reply is accurate, consistent, and on-brand, freeing your team to focus on the issues that actually require judgment or empathy. When a message needs a human touch, Quidget 2 hands it over with full context and conversation historyâ€”no confusion, just easy collaboration between AI and people.

name: Orkap (Beta)
tagline: Smart Outreach Management & Link Building Platform
description: The Ultimate outreach platform for marketers & SEO pros. Build backlinks with smart contact management, automated follow-ups & analytics.

name: Signeasy: Al-Powered eSign app
tagline: Al-Powered Smarter contract reviews with Apple Intelligence
description: Signeasy + Apple Intelligence = faster, smarter contract reviews. Summarize agreements, spot key terms, and understand clauses instantly - all securely on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac.

name: Sinosend
tagline: Time to graduate from WeTransfer. Send files, win deals.
description: WeTransfer is the GOAT, but their recent terms change, non-stop ads were a dealbreaker for our business. That's why we built Sinosend. TLDR; Send a 3GB password protected file for free without signing on our home page. Signup and choose your data residency (US, EU, Asia, Middle East) Store files closer to you or your recipients for faster transfer speeds. Don't just send filesâ€”build your business with every transfer on your your custom domain (docs.yoursite.com)

name: Stunning
tagline: Build Fullstack WebApps 10x Faster with AI
description: Stunning is the fastest Vibe coding platform that lets you build Full stack Apps with Backend & Database built in. It comes stacked with Latest coding LLMs to choose from and supports RTL.

name: AxWise - AI User Discovery Engine
tagline: AI-powered enterprise discovery in 17 minutes, not weeks
description: AxWise is an open-source enterprise discovery engine that automates customer research from 6 weeks to 17 minutes. 4 AI-agents work together: Research Helper scopes problems, Context Builder maps stakeholders, Synthetic Generator simulates hundreds of interviews, and Analysis Engine creates perpetual, location-aware personas with auditable PRDs. Built for product managers, venture studios, and enterprise teams. 100% Apache licensedâ€”deploy anywhere, own your data, no vendor lock-in.

name: AccioJob
tagline: technology
description: Learn Full Stack, Data Science with AccioJob. Get expert training, hands-on projects & placement support. Enroll today to get hired!

name: Keyword Grid
tagline: Rank higher in search results & AI answers
description: Wondering why your page isn't ranking in Google and AI answers? This tool can help with that. Analyze any URL and see your relevance, intent, and quality scores â€” the same way Google and LLMs see them. Built on the most accurate relevance model (ranked #1 on the MTEB leaderboard). No more guesswork. Just detailed and accurate insights to improve your visibility in search results and AI answers.

name: GTWY
tagline: Top AI Models via One API
description: Access top AI models through a single API with GTWY.AI. GTWY.AI unifies leading LLMs and AI providers into one powerful, scalable API layer â€” giving you instant access to the best models without complex integrations or vendor lock-in. Whether youâ€™re building AI agents, workflows, or automation tools, GTWY.AI makes it simple to connect, deploy, and scale intelligent systems anywhere.

name: Trust My MRR
tagline: Prove your MRR, not your faith â€” the open-source TrustMRR.
description: The open source alternative to TrustMRR by Marc Lou. Track and compare startup revenue metrics with transparent Stripe data. Discover MRR, total revenue, and customer metrics from successful founders and startups.
